text: timber harvesting trespass civil penalty amend rsa i to read as follows no person shall negligently cut fell destroy injure or carry away or cause to be cut felled destroyed injured or carried away any tree timber log wood pole underwood or bark which is on the land of another person or aid in such actions without the permission of that person or the person s agent timber harvesting trespass criminal penalty amend rsa i to read as follows no person shall recklessly cut fell destroy injure or carry away or cause to be cut felled destroyed injured or carried away any tree timber log wood pole underwood or bark which is on the land of another person or aid in such actions without the permission of that person or the person s agent
